doc:
Richard Martin (RKO actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_Martin_(RKO_actor) 0 Richard Martin (December 12, 1917 – September 4, 1994) was a prolific RKO contract actor. He was most known for his role as Chito Rafferty, the Irish-Mexican western comedy relief sidekick of Tim Holt. Before their pairing, Martin originated the role in the 1943 film Bombardier. Richard_Martin ( December_12_,_1917 – September_4_,_1994 ) was a_prolific_RKO_contract_actor . He was_most_known for his_role as Chito_Rafferty , the_Irish-Mexican_western_comedy_relief_sidekick of Tim_Holt . Before their_pairing , Martin originated the_role in the_1943_film_Bombardier .
